summary:
Advanced software engineer with experience in creating modern, fast, aesthetically pleasing, and scalable software products. I have actively participated as a contributor in industry-leading open-source projects such as Material-UI, React Native, and Cypress.io, and even ffmpeg. Additionally, I have created several popular open-source projects myself.

I possess a strong understanding of both object-oriented programming (OOP) and functional programming (FP) paradigms, as well as algorithms and software architecture principles. My expertise lies in developing and shipping large, scalable, robust, and efficient software used by millions people all over the world.

employment.responsibilities: Joined the very start of innovative supply chain startup as a lead developer.
Getting back to Cypress.io to work on component testing.

projects.responsibilities: Author and main architect of cypress component testing https://www.cypress.io/blog/2021/04/06/introducing-the-cypress-component-test-runner/

employment.responsibilities: Working for Material-UI with a focus on making the most popular react date picker in the world
Development, designing and testing for the awesome Cypress.io
Full-stack javascript development, team leadership, designing project architecture and development flow
